document_data.mainbody:
The Sparkle Hands were a unique set gauntletss crafted by the lightning-obsessed inventor Yrre the Sparkstruck.
Whenever the wearer of Sparkle Hands built up electrical charges within their body―a feat achieved using some of Yrres other inventions―they gained increased physical powers. They became more swift and agile, and felt increased strength course through their body.
As of the , the gloves remained hidden away in a chest, found in the Sunlit Wetlands swamp off the River Chionthar.
